#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int N;
    cin>>N;
    string input;
    cin>>input;
    while(N--)
    {
        string s;
        cin>>s;
 
        while(input.find(s)!=std::string::npos){
        input.replace(input.find(s),s.length(),"");
        }
        if(input.length()==0){
            cout<<"0"<<endl;
            break;}
            else if(N==0){
             cout<<input<<endl;
            }
    }
    return 0;
}
